com.qoppa.pdf

Class EmbedFileOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qoppa.pdf.EmbedFileOptions

  • public class EmbedFileOptions
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbedFileOptions(java.lang.String desc, java.lang.String relation)
      Create an EmbedFileOptions object with the given description and relationship.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets the description of the embedded file (to be saved in the embedded file specifications dictionary).
      java.lang.String getRelationship()
      Gets the relationship of the embedded file in relation to the document (to be saved in the embedded file specifications dictionary).
      boolean isZugferdInvoice()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether the embedded file is a ZUGFeRD invoice.
      void setZugferdInvoice(boolean isZugferd)
      Indicates if the embedded file is a ZUGFeRD invoice.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EmbedFileOptions

        public EmbedFileOptions(java.lang.String desc,
                java.lang.String relation)
        Create an EmbedFileOptions object with the given description and relationship. Relationship and Description will be saved in the embedded file specifications dictionary.
        Parameters:
        desc - The description of the embedded file
        relation - The relationship of the embedded file relative to the document

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Gets the description of the embedded file (to be saved in the embedded file specifications dictionary).
        Returns:
        The description

      • getRelationship

        public java.lang.String getRelationship()
        Gets the relationship of the embedded file in relation to the document (to be saved in the embedded file specifications dictionary).
        Returns:
        The relationship

      • setZugferdInvoice

        public void setZugferdInvoice(boolean isZugferd)
        Indicates if the embedded file is a ZUGFeRD invoice. When this is on, an additional entry will be saved in the root catalog of the document that points to the embedded file.
        Parameters:
        isZugferd - true or false

      • isZugferdInvoice

        public boolean isZugferdInvoice()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the embedded file is a ZUGFeRD invoice.
        Returns:
        true or false
